name: Lost In Dimensions
description:
Lost In Dimensions

You wake up in a mysterious place with no memory of what led to this. Go around exploring, find other people in the same scenario, know their story, and help them in any way you can. Why is everyone lost in other dimensions? Face the person Behind it all.
Yes, this game has a climactic ending.

Go Explore and talk to the characters all around the map. Enjoying the beautiful yet contained dimensions.

This game was made in 5 days for the InterstellarGameJam-4

Controls:

A/D: Left and Right respectively
Space: Jump
E: Interact
ESCAPE: Pause/Unpause

Made By:

VantaTree: Developer (Itch.io, Github)
ֆɦɨʍɨօռ: Dialogue Writer (Itch.io)

Credits:

Portal sprite by Pipoya, pixelated with Pixelator
4 NPCs by ansimuz
3 NPCs by maranza
2 NPCs by penusbmic
Other NPCs: piranha, blue witch, Necromancer, skeleton
Music track by ansimuz
SFX from freesound.org
